content: rosie the cosmic girl strictly do not copy sell alter or re-distribute this pattern in any form the finished item using this pattern can be sold however images from this pattern are not to be used when selling the finished item all rights reserved © cara engwerda trading as cara s creations 2020 find me on facebook etsy and instagram @carascreationsaus patterns also available on amigurumi com and lovecrafts i d love to see your finished items either tag me or use #carascreationsaus #rosiethecosmicgirl rosie the cosmic girl is truly out of this world from her cute little antennae to her space suit rosie is learning all about her earth friends and experiences with great curiosity difficulty intermediate us terminology materials abbreviations  2 0mm hook/b-1 us  chain = chain  4ply yarn/fingering > less than 50g  magic_ring = magic_ring yarn in mint petrol pink and  single_crochet = single_crochet coral  increase = single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet in one stitch  7mm safety eyes  decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 together  scissors  slip_stitch = slip_stitch  tapestry needle  blo = back loops only  polyester toy stuffing  = repeat the space in brackets the  stitch marker given number of times  = total number of stitches notes  a yarn with no stretch is best for amigurumi i ordinarily use cotton or cotton blend  amigurumi is usually stitched in the round unless it says otherwise  for this pattern the following yarns were used o mint = hobbii rainbow 8/4 cotton in colour 25 pastel mint o petrol = hobbii rainbow 8/4 cotton in colour 35 petrol blue o pink = scheepjes cotton 8 in colour 718 o coral = scheepjes catona in colour 51 coral  generally the hook you use for amigurumi will be a smaller than for other crochet as you want the stitches tight  your gauge the yarn thickness and hook size used will affect the size of the finished item my rosie the cosmic girl is approximately 20cm tall 8 inches  i have used safety eyes for this pattern but you may embroider please ensure that there are no loose fittings 2 | p age © cara engwerda trading as cara s creations 2020 crochet pattern head mint 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 increase x 6 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 4 single_crochet x 2 increase x 6 24 5 single_crochet x 3 increase x 6 30 6 single_crochet x 4 increase x 6 36 7 single_crochet x 5 increase x 6 42 8 single_crochet x 6 increase x 6 48 9 single_crochet x 7 increase x 6 54 10-16 single_crochet x 54 54 17 single_crochet x 7 decrease x 6 48 18 single_crochet x 6 decrease x 6 42 19 single_crochet x 5 decrease x 6 36 20 single_crochet x 4 decrease x 6 30 insert 7mm safety eyes between rounds 14-15 8 stitches apart 21 single_crochet x 3
